name: LYKE_Home_Opal_Reversible_Taupe_Sectional
description: If you want to transform your living room or seating area to create an oasis of relaxing style and comfort, you'll find the Opal sectional the right choice for your home. This sectional also includes coordinating throw pillows in complimentary colors and patterns to pull together this contemporary and inviting look. Sleek modern styling and attractive design elements make this Opal reversible sectional seating from LYKE Home a great way to add comfort and appeal to your living room or den. Quality craftsmanship in every detail ensures comfort and durability. Sectional design incorporates interesting details such as ultra-plush cushioning and studded trim. StyleModernMaterialMicrofiberTypeSectional SofaAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorTaupeFurniture PatternSolid
